description: Save your hard shell for the hard stuff. This laid-back, everyday rain parka has a vibe straight out of the 70's with the innovative modern rain protection that you've come to trust in every Marmot rain jacket. The Men’s ‘78 All-Weather Parka seamlessly fits in with your everyday life and over your everyday wardrobe, making it the perfect commuter layer when rain is coming down or the storm clouds are rolling in. Built with a waterproof and breathable face fabric and PFC-free DWR treatment, this parka will keep your around or downtown town style in check and your clothes dry so you can save your ski shell for the ski trip.
name: Marmot 78 All-Weather Parka - Mens
